data.name: Happy VR Plantation Farm
data.detailed_description:
This is a casual game that simulates planting. Players can plant a variety of plants, water and fertilize the planted plants themselves, while transforming their own plant farms, while harvesting crops to resist hunger, maintain and replenish their own state, so as to prevent their own hunger from slowing down their actions. , Experience the process of planting from sowing to growing to harvesting.

Instructions:
Moving method:
1. The handle direction buttons control the movement of the character, and the right handle controls the angle of view rotation
menu:
1. Handle menu switch menu display
2. Handle trigger to select items and buttons
Other operations:
1. Align the center of the screen with plants to view plant properties and status
2. Handle side button to cancel item selection/display laser
3. Handle trigger to harvest crops and open and close doors
4. Long press the side button of the handle to remove the crop

data.short_description: This is a casual game that simulates planting. Players can plant a variety of plants, water and fertilize the plants themselves, while transforming their plant farms, while harvesting crops to resist hunger, maintain and replenish their own state.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 / AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
